The online advertisement displayed the w: Amazon Prime Increased Its Prices" and showed Amazon Prime boxes at a doorstep, suggesting a recent price increase.
The prices for Amazon Prime: s monthly and annual memberships had not increased since early 2018, as of Jan. 4, 2021.
The source code of the advertorial: style page for the Capital One Shopping browser extension revealed that it was originally published almost three years earlier, on Jan. 30, 2018.
In January 2018: an announcement was made about the monthly price increase of Amazon Prime from $10.99 to $12.99, and in April 2018, it was reported that the annual membership price would also increase from $99 to $119.
